cards.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this card?

actions.action_confirmation: Are you sure you want to run action ''{action}''?
actions.no_entity_more_info: No entity provided for more info dialog

empty_state.title: Dobrodošao kući
empty_state.no_devices: This page allows you to control your devices, however it looks like you have no devices set up yet. Head to the integrations page to get started.

iframe.error_secure_context: Nije moguće učitati iframe koji pokazuju na Veb lokacije koristeći {target_protocol} ako je Home Assistant serviran preko {context_protocol}.

recovery-mode.description: NDX Tech ran into trouble while loading your configuration and is now running in recovery mode. Take a look at the error log to see what went wrong.

starting.description: NDX Tech is starting, please wait…

energy.no_data: Nema podataka za prikazivanje. Novim podacima može biti potrebno do 2 sata da stignu nakon što konfigurišete kontrolnu tablu za energiju.

solar_consumed_gauge.card_indicates_solar_energy_used: Ova kartica pokazuje koliko je solarne energije, koju ste proizveli, koristio vaš dom umesto da bude vraćen u mrežu.
solar_consumed_gauge.card_indicates_solar_energy_used_charge_: Ako je ovaj broj obično veoma nizak, to ukazuje na višak solarne proizvodnje, možda bi trebalo da razmislite o punjenju kućne baterije ili električnog automobila iz solarnih panela u vreme velike solarne proizvodnje.
solar_consumed_gauge.self_consumed_solar_could_not_calc: Ne može se izračunati samopotrošena solarna energija

self_sufficiency_gauge.card_indicates_self_sufficiency_quota: This card indicates how much of the energy consumed by your home came from on-site sources (such as solar panels or batteries).

grid_neutrality_gauge.energy_dependency: Ova kartica ukazuje na korišćenje neto energije.
grid_neutrality_gauge.color_explain: Ako je igla u ljubičastoj boji, vratili ste više energije u mrežu nego što ste konzumirali iz nje. Ako je u plavom, potrošili ste više energije iz mreže nego što ste vratili.

energy_distribution.go_to_energy_dashboard: Idite na kontrolnu tablu za energiju

carbon_consumed_gauge.card_indicates_energy_used: Ova kartica ukazuje na to koliko je energije koju je utrošio vaš dom generisano korišćenjem ne-fosilnih goriva kao što su solarna, vetar i nuklearna. Što više, to bolje!
carbon_consumed_gauge.low_carbon_energy_not_calculated: Consumed low-carbon energy couldn't be calculated

unused_entities.title: Neiskorišćeni entiteti
unused_entities.available_entities: Ovo su entiteti koje imate na raspolaganju, ali još uvek nisu na vašoj kontrolnoj tabli.
unused_entities.select_to_add: Izaberite entitete koje želite da dodate na karticu, a zatim kliknite na dugme za dodavanje kartice.

add_entities.yaml_unsupported: You cannot use this function when using your dashboard in YAML mode.
add_entities.generated_unsupported: You can only use this function when you have taken control of your dashboard.

views.confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view?
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards: Deleting this view will also remove the cards
views.confirm_delete_existing_cards_text: Are you sure you want to delete your ''{name}'' view? The view contains {number} cards that will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

reload_resources.refresh_body: Morate da osvežite stranicu da biste dovršili ponovno učitavanje. Želite li sada da osvežite?

editor.yaml_unsupported: The edit UI is not available when in YAML mode.

raw_editor.lovelace_changed: Your dashboard was updated, do you want to load the updated config in the editor and lose your current changes?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_title: Are you sure you want to remove your dashboard configuration?
raw_editor.confirm_remove_config_text: We will automatically generate your dashboard views with your areas and devices if you remove your dashboard configuration.
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_changes: You have unsaved changes, are you sure you want to exit?
raw_editor.confirm_unsaved_comments: Your configuration might contains comment(s), these will not be saved. Do you want to continue?
raw_editor.resources_moved: Resources should no longer be added to the dashboard configuration but can be added in the dashboard config panel.

edit_lovelace.explanation: Ovaj naziv je prikazan iznad svih prikaza na kontrolnoj tabli.
edit_lovelace.title: Title

visibility.select_users: Izaberite koji korisnici bi trebalo da vide ovaj prikaz u navigaciji

edit_view.subview_helper: Dodatni pogled se ne pojavljuju na karticama i ima dugme za povratak.
edit_view.error_same_url: You cannot save a view with the same URL as a different existing view.

edit_badges.view_no_badges: Trenutni tip prikaza ne podržava značke.

edit_card.pick_card_view_title: Koju karticu želite da dodate u pogled {name} ?
edit_card.confirm_cancel: Da li ste sigurni da želite da otkažete?

move_card.header: Choose a view to move the card to

change_position.title: Change card position
change_position.text: What position do you want to move your card to?

suggest_card.header: We created a suggestion for you

save_config.para: This dashboard is currently being maintained by NDX Tech. It is automatically updated when new entities or dashboard components become available. If you take control, this dashboard will no longer be automatically updated. You can always create a new dashboard in configuration to play around with.
save_config.para_sure: Are you sure you want to take control of your user interface?
save_config.yaml_mode: You are using YAML mode for this dashboard, which means you cannot change your dashboard config from the UI. If you want to manage this dashboard from the UI, remove 'mode: yaml' from your dashboard configuration in 'configuration.yaml.'.
save_config.yaml_control: To take control in YAML mode, create a YAML file with the name you specified in your config for this dashboard, or the default 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
save_config.yaml_config: To help you start here is the current config of this dashboard:

migrate.para_no_id: This element doesn't have an ID. Please add an ID to this element in 'ui-lovelace.yaml'.
migrate.para_migrate: NDX Tech can add IDs to all your cards and views automatically for you by pressing the 'Migrate configuration' button.

condition-editor.explanation: The card will be shown when ALL conditions below are fulfilled.
condition-editor.invalid_config_text: The condition can not be tested because the configuration is not valid.

alarm-panel.name: Kartica alarma
alarm-panel.description: The Alarm panel card allows you to arm and disarm your alarm control panel integrations.

area.name: Oblast
area.description: Kartica "Oblast" automatski prikazuje entitete određene oblasti.
area.show_camera: Prikaži snimak fotoaparata umesto slike oblasti

calendar.name: Kalendar
calendar.description: Kartica kalendar prikazuje kalendar uključujući prikaze dana, nedelja i lista

conditional.name: Conditional
conditional.description: The Conditional card displays another card based on entity states.

entities.name: Entiteti
entities.description: The Entities card is the most common type of card. It groups items together into lists.
entities.edit_special_row: View the details of this row by clicking the edit button

entity.name: Entitet
entity.description: The Entity card gives you a quick overview of your entity's state.

button.name: Dugme
button.description: The Button card allows you to add buttons to perform tasks.
button.default_action_help: The default action depends on the entity's capabilities, it will either be toggled or the more info dialog will be shown.

entity-filter.name: Filtriraj entitete
entity-filter.description: The Entity filter card allows you to define a list of entities that you want to track only when in a certain state.

gauge.name: Merač
gauge.description: The Gauge card is a basic card that allows visually seeing sensor data.

glance.name: Pogled
glance.description: The Glance card is useful to group multiple sensors in a compact overview.

grid.name: Mreža
grid.description: Mrežna kartica vam omogućava da prikažete više kartica u koordinatnoj mreži.
grid.title: Title

logbook.name: Dnevnik
logbook.description: Kartica Dnevnika prikazuje listu događaja za entitete.

history-graph.name: Istorijski grafikon
history-graph.description: Kartica istorijskog grafikona vam omogućava da prikažete grafikon za svaki od navedenih entiteta.
history-graph.fit_y_data: Extend Y axis limits to fit data

statistics-graph.name: Statistički grafikon
statistics-graph.description: Kartica Statistički grafikon vam omogućava da prikažete grafikon statistike za svaki od navedenih entiteta.

statistic.name: Statistika
statistic.description: Statistička kartica vam omogućava da prikažete statističku vrednost entiteta određenog perioda.

horizontal-stack.name: Horizontal stack
horizontal-stack.description: The Horizontal stack card allows you to stack together multiple cards, so they always sit next to each other in the space of one column.

humidifier.name: Ovlaživač
humidifier.description: The Humidifier card gives control of your humidifier entity. Allowing you to change the humidity and mode of the entity.
humidifier.show_current_as_primary: Show current humidity as primary information

iframe.name: Veb stranica
iframe.description: The Webpage card allows you to embed your favorite webpage right into NDX Tech.

light.name: Svetlo
light.description: The Light card allows you to change the brightness of the light.

generic.manual_description: Želite li da dodate prilagođenu karticu ili samo želite ručno da napišete YAML?
generic.name: Naziv
generic.paste_description: Paste a {type} card from the clipboard
generic.title: Naslov

map.name: Mapa
map.description: The Map card that allows you to display entities on a map.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: The Markdown card is used to render Markdown.

media-control.name: Kontrola medija
media-control.description: The Media control card is used to display media player entities on an interface with easy to use controls.

picture.name: Slika
picture.description: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.

picture-elements.name: Picture elements
picture-elements.description: The Picture elements card is one of the most versatile types of cards. The cards allow you to position icons or text and even services! On an image based on coordinates.

picture-entity.name: Picture entity
picture-entity.description: The Picture entity card displays an entity in the form of an image. Instead of images from URL, it can also show the picture of camera entities.

picture-glance.name: Picture glance
picture-glance.description: The Picture card allows you to set an image to use for navigation to various paths in your interface or to call a service.

plant-status.name: Plant status
plant-status.description: The Plant status card is for all the lovely botanists out there.

sensor.name: Senzor
sensor.description: The Sensor card gives you a quick overview of your sensors state with an optional graph to visualize change over time.

todo-list.name: To-do list
todo-list.description: The to-do list card allows you to add, edit, check-off, and clear items from your to-do list.
todo-list.integration_not_loaded: This card requires the `todo` integration to be set up.

thermostat.name: Termostat
thermostat.description: The Thermostat card gives control of your climate entity. Allowing you to change the temperature and mode of the entity.
thermostat.show_current_as_primary: Show current temperature as primary information

tile.name: Pločica
tile.description: Kartica pločice vam pruža brz pregled entiteta. Kartica vam omogućava da promite entitet, prikažete više informacija ili prilagođene radnje.

vertical-stack.name: Vertical stack
vertical-stack.description: The Vertical stack card allows you to group multiple cards so they always sit in the same column.

weather-forecast.name: Vremenska prognoza
weather-forecast.description: The Weather forecast card displays the weather. Very useful to include on interfaces that people display on the wall.
weather-forecast.show_both: Prikaži trenutnu vremensku prognozu i prognozu

features.name: Features
features.no_compatible_available: No compatible features available for this entity

panel_mode.warning_multiple_cards: This view contains more than one card, but a panel view can only show 1 card.

warning.starting: NDX Tech is starting, not everything may be available yet

changed_toast.message: Your dashboard was updated. Refresh to see changes?
